a.n: Tinariwen - Les Déferlantes Sud de France 2017

p.k: Grammy Award-winning group Tinariwen comes from the Sahara Desert region of northern Mali. AllMusic calls Tinariwen 'the voice of rebellion' due to its blend of elements from world, blues, folk, and rock music.
p.d: Music festival Les Déferlantes Sud de France presents a lineup that includes a variety of artists from various music genres, including hip-hop, reggae, electronic dance music, and many more. Beautifully located at the French coastal town of Argeles-sur-Mer, the festival attracts a wide range of music fans from around the world to enjoy the most eclectic musical acts. On the bill is Tinariwen, a Grammy Award-winning Tuareg group from the Sahara Desert region of northern Mali. AllMusic calls Tinariwen 'the voice of rebellion' due to its blend of elements from world, blues, folk, and rock music.
